'''Radiant Spincrystal 72''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Forgotten Epic]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It has a chance to be sold by the [[Teapot Traveling Salesman]]. It can only be purchased after completing ''[[Ritou Escape Plan]]''.
